head.title: Has It Come to This? Spacious, Arctic Vu

hedline.hl1: Has It Come to This? Spacious, Arctic Vu

block.p: Re ''As Polar Ice Turns to Water, Dreams of Treasure Abound'' (''The Big Melt'' series, front page, Oct. 10):
Hold on a second. The polar ice cap is melting. Melting -- to its smallest size ever recorded.
Re ''As Polar Ice Turns to Water, Dreams of Treasure Abound'' (''The Big Melt'' series, front page, Oct. 10):
Hold on a second. The polar ice cap is melting. Melting -- to its smallest size ever recorded.
Let's step back from our ''land grab'' long enough to contemplate the bigger picture.

The possible economic effects of full-fledged global warming (collapse of fisheries, more devastating storms, ecosystem destruction) are going to cost us much more than a few new ports here and there will ever make up for.
We must focus our energy on reducing carbon emissions now, for the inevitability of this crisis is partly determined by our willingness to stop it.
